nodes.bodyText: I don't know why, but this annotation is present in similar classes (ConfigMapVolumeConfig, PvcVolumeConfig), but it wasn't here. I added it, but I don't know what I'm doing :-)

Could someone really have a look to the generated documentation and see if we can use it?
If we have proper Quarkus config now, it will really be a big win.

nodes.bodyText:
BTW, one things that bugs me is that we have things like timeout-seconds in the doc.
I don't know how they have been translated in Quarkus config but they should be Duration and named timeout without -seconds.
That's really something we want done before Final so either @iocanel can have a look or I will, just tell me.
